channel.title: How to like... wipeThings(); somebody else
channel.description: I would like to know how I can make a command that works like ::banuser except that it will like... do 'wipeThings();' or 'resetBank();' instead of banning the user. So, it would first be the command name, like [b]banuser[/b], then it would be the players name, then when I click enter it will do the command to that player. I would like to know as said how to make a command like this. Any help appreciated, thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 05:56:45 PM[/size][hr]Anybody know how?

item.title: How to like... wipeThings(); somebody else
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Yes, but I mean I want to make a command for this, for my Admin’s to use also. Obviously I don’t give my Admin’s my Source. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 07:57:28 AM[/size][hr]I want this command to be used as a punishment to bad players’.

Read full topic
item.source: How to like... wipeThings(); somebody else

item.title: How to like... wipeThings(); somebody else
item.dc:creator: @Duhsmersh Duhsmersh
item.description:
@Duhsmersh wrote:

so like a command that wipes out the bank/items? well if you want to all you have to do is delete that player’s char file, once that person logs in they will be wiped clean and level 3 again

Read full topic

So, it would first be the command name, like banuser, then it would be the players name, then when I click enter it will do the command to that player.
